title: Where the Wild Things Are
short_plot_summary: A young boy named Max, dressed in a wolf costume, goes on an imaginary adventure to an island inhabited by wild creatures, where he becomes their king.
explanation: A boy, representing the main character, Max
A bed, symbolizing Max's bedroom where his adventure begins
A plant, illustrating the wild environment of the island
A monster, representing the wild creatures that live on the island
A crown, signifying Max's role as king of the wild things
